title: Board level and summoner level not updating
body: Was reading the forums and people said to try posting here to make my summoner and forum level update. Well here goes the test.

replies.body: This is correct, a post like this will force a sync of your Summoner and Boards profiles! It looks like it may have worked, so happy posting! :)
Sadly I did have to go and open a ticket, initially it didn't work.
